dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach the Flame Dancer, mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. Let's talk.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Ha! Mortals bring nothing but chaos and destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no harm, I just need information.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Informatio, you say? What makes you think I would help you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can offer you something valuable in return.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Valuable? Very well. What do you offer?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you're not interested. I'll leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmph, leave then. Your presence annoys me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a fight, demon!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You think you can challenge me? Foolish mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will defeat you and prove my strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You will regret challenging the Flame Dancer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I... I was mistaken. I apologize.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't save you now. Prepare to face your demise.
Farewell, mortal. Do not return unless you seek destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to defeat you and claim victory.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, another foolish opponent dares to challenge the Flame Dancer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will crush you and leave no trace of your existence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, mortal. Let us see if you can back them up.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your power. I will retreat for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weakling! Fleeing only proves your cowardice.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to fight. I will leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, mortal. Your presence is not welcomed.
